summary: WHEN THE BRAKES WERE APPLIED, THERE WAS A  POPPING NOISE FROM UNDER FRONT END.  ALSO A CREAKING NOISE WAS HEARD FROM UNDER THE RIGHT FRONT WHEN CAR WAS AT IDLE AND WHEN THE STEERING WAS TURNED BACK AND FORTH.  CUSTOMER FELT NOISE WAS RELATED.  DEALERSHIP COULD NOT FIND AT THE TIME.  THIS HAPPENED THREE TIMES.   *TT  *JB
